Class View

java.lang.Object
View
public class View extends Object
Class from mvc pattern that works with application interface and connect user with model with the help of controller

    • printCheck

      public void printCheck(Transaction transaction, HashMap<String,Object> map, org.yaml.snakeyaml.Yaml yaml)
      Function that prints check after successful operation in file check/output + number of check
      Parameters:
      transaction - is object that have information about current transaction
      map - is information from config.yml that needed to now number of current check
      yaml - is Yaml object with the help of which we work with .yml file
